sense.def:
A slave
je oseba, ki je last neke druge osebe in mora delati zanjo.

seg.quote: ...a story about a slave who escapes and becomes a free man.

sense.def:
To be a slave to something
pomeni biti pod močnim vplivom nečesa ali biti podrejen nečemu.

seg.quote: He's just become a slave to possessions and money.

sense.def:
To slave for someone
pomeni trdo delati za nekoga.

seg.quote: Why am I slaving away, running a house and family single-handed?
